name: Music Wars Rockstar
description:
Rise to the top as a teen pop singer, find your way as a screaming metalhead, hone your craft as a gangsta rap artist, and more. Release albums and tour the world as you fight to make your mark on the music industry.

+ Choose your starting scenario to try to make it big, like starting off in a high school band or as the child of a famous artist
+ Choose your music genre: Pop, Rap, Rock, R&B, and more
+ Choose your character's specialty, be a singer, a rapper, or even a banjo player
+ Release Singles, Albums, EPs, and Music Videos
+ Play shows and tour the world
+ Promote your record with various media appearances
+ Respond to life events affecting your health, creativity and happiness
+ Manage your career by joining a band, changing its lineup, or going solo
+ Track your releases on pure sales and streaming equivalent sales charts
+ Compete on the charts against other artists and bands to be number one
+ Achieve career milestones like earning platinum status or reaching the Hall of Fame
+ Customize your character's appearance
